description: Numerator of the x-coordinate of the 3rd point (x,y) of the n-th triangle with integer sides i <= j <= k in a list sorted by increasing area, when the triangle is drawn with the shortest side from (0,0) to (0,i) and the middle side from (0,i) to (x,y). x = a(n)/A331248(n), y = sqrt(A331249(n))/A331248(n).
